body.name: Molly's Suds Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets for Sensitive Skin | Plant-Based Static Reducer, Plastic-Free Packaging | Peppermint (120 Sheets)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: SOFT-STATIC FREE CLOTHES: Our 97% plant-based dryer sheets employ a gentle fabric softening technology to leave clothes feeling fresh, cozy, and comfy. Better for people with sensitive skin, the environment, and your dryer, these dryer sheets effectively eliminate static so you and your clothes look and feel your best

INSPIRED BY NATURE: Made with essential oils derived from Mother Earth, certified Cruelty-Free by Leaping Bunny and Made in the USA. Our dryer sheets are free of waxes, dyes, harsh fragrances, and animal derivatives. The only thing you will experience are baby soft clothes that smell light and airy
FEMALE FOUNDED: Molly's Suds was founded by a pediatric nurse & mom who felt we all deserve cleaning products made with simpler, safer, more transparent ingredients.

CONVENIENT AND COMPOSTABLE: Whether you have all day or just a few minutes to spare, our dryer sheets are convenient to toss in the dryer and can be used more than once. After using, dispose of our dryer sheets packaging in your recycling and give yourself a pat on the back.

HOW TO USE: Toss 1 of our natural dryer sheets with your wet clothes into the dryer and dry according to garment care instructions. For small or delicate loads of laundry, use half of a dryer sheet. To infuse your clothes with extra natural fragrance and softness, use 2 dryer sheets.

Are Molly's Suds products safe for sensitive skin? Yes! Many of our customers have sensitive skin or eczema and that is why they use all of our products. There are no harsh or leaching chemicals and each product is clean rinsing. Are your detergents HE-friendly? Yes! All of our detergents are safe for standard, HE, and commercial washing machines. Our powder detergents do best when you add it directly to your drum and then toss in your laundry. Are your detergents septic-safe? Are they grey water safe? All of our laundry and cleaning products are septic-safe. Our Original Laundry Powder is grey water-safe, we even had it soil tested! Are Molly's Suds products safe to use while pregnant and/or for my baby's clothing? All of our products are safe to use during pregnancy. Our laundry products are all safe for use on baby clothing. Many parents choose our unscented laundry products for newborns, however our scented options are safe to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe to use
reviews.reviewText: We purchased these to replace the store bought ones that have some very harmful chemicals in them. They work great! Clothes are soft and static free amd smell great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best non-toxic & unscented dryer sheets I have been able to find. They do a good job and I plan to continue using them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not horrible, no great
reviews.reviewText: I love Molly's powder detergent. These are so so. They are not soft at all and the scent is fine. They do work well though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful healthy smell of lavender and soft clothes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars they work very good
reviews.reviewText: Molly's suds products have a lot of natural ingredients in them. These days, with all the horrible products in our foods and cleaning agents, it's nice to find a good company that cares about what they sell their customers. Hopefully, they don't get bought out like all the others. Thanks for a great product. The drier sheets work very well, with no more harsh chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Leaves NO scent! 😭
reviews.reviewText: I got this one in peppermint. When I opened the Amazon bag, I got excited at how potent the scent was. And this was before opening the dryer sheet box. I tested this with a load of laundry right away looking forward to my clothes smelling minty fresh, but I was disappointed. When I tell you this left ZERO fragrance. I was bummed. Not even a trace of it. I even waited hours later when the clothes cooled down to see if there was something, but nope! So when it comes to picking a fragrance, I would probably pick any since it won't leave a scent anyway. Like the detergent, I appreciate the reason behind this brand with is being as healthy as possible and also cruelty free. But I personally love having some fresh scent because not having any makes it feel like it's not clean and makes my laundry routine less enjoyable. The positive thing is that it does leave my clothes soft. So if you're all about unscented and natural laundry products, this is for you. I sadly won't buy it again until they find a way to make the fragrance stay on your clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you love lavender this is for you!
reviews.reviewText: After throwing away my older dryer sheets and going with a natural option, I can’t say enough good things about these! Helps with all the static and my clothing comes out smelling so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm a convert!
reviews.reviewText: So, for all these years I never knew or cared to learn about what's in regular store brand fabric softener sheets... Saw an ad for a different brand of this type of sheet, so came to Amazon to read and learn. I decided on this product and am very pleased. I chose peppermint scent, and no, my clothes didn't smell like gum, lol. And the clothes came from the dryer so nice and soft! I just got these, so have only done a few loads of laundry, but I believe I'm converted!
